name: GoodActor
0:
”Alexa, tell Good Actor to give me a positive challenge”
”Alexa, ask Good Actor to give me a positive task to perform”
”Alexa, ask Good Actor for a positive action”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good actor
des: This skill's purpose is to help you and those around you feel positive by challenging you to perform a daily positive task to complete. These daily challenges can be thought of as a way for you and those you come in contact with, feel more positive! Simply enable this skill to have your Alexa device assign you a positive undertaking and complete the positive task by the end of the day!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
